垁字的基本解释

垁
zhì
古同“雉”，古代计算城墙面积的单位。

垁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《集韻》直几切，上旨，澄。］
“雉1”的古字。
古代城高与长各一丈为一堵，三堵为一垁。

垁字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垁； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页227第15
【集韻】直几切，音雉。城三堵也。　又【揚子·太?經】閑黃埃，席金策。【註】宗廟中有黃垁金策，埃或作垁。【左傳】作雉。

垁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
垁字的起名意思

暂无。

垁
Basic explanation of words
垁
zhì
In ancient times, the same "pheasant" was a unit for calculating the area of city walls in ancient times.
垁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Jiyun" straight cut, decree, clear. ]
The ancient character of "Pheasant 1".
In ancient times, the height and length of the city each constituted a block, and the three blocks constituted a block.
垁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垁; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 227 15
[Jiyun] Straight cut several times, sound pheasant. Three blocks of the city are also.　[Yangtze·Tai? Jing] Xian Huang Ai, Xi Jince. [Note] In the ancestral temple, there are Huang Yan Jin Ce, Ae or Zuo Yan. [Zuo Zhuan] As a pheasant.
